name: Fragmented (itch) (AGK, Megumax)
description:
Fragmented is a puzzle game jam game that is inspired by Baba Is You. It introduces an alternate opposite dimension.

After playing with the fabric of reality, you find yourself in a twisted reality with strange physics. You try to play along and figure out how to escape the reality.

You can Press Z to UNDO your actions/movements

If you have problems not being able to see the entire level, put the game at full screen!
